mapper.select: SELECT ATTENDANCE_CHECK_NO AS no, ATTENDANCE_CHECK_USER_NO AS "user.no", ATTENDANCE_CHECK_DATE AS checkDate, ATTENDANCE_DATE AS count, ATTENDANCE_CHECK_YN AS checkYn FROM ATTENDANCE_CHECKS WHERE ATTENDANCE_CHECK_USER_NO = #{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE ATTENDANCE_CHECKS SET ATTENDANCE_DATE = ATTENDANCE_DATE + 1, ATTENDANCE_CHECK_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ATTENDANCE_CHECK_USER_NO = #{no}
UPDATE ATTENDANCE_CHECKS SET ATTENDANCE_DATE = 0 WHERE ATTENDANCE_DATE = 28 AND ATTENDANCE_CHECK_USER_NO = #{no}
